title: (Thurs Early) Amy Has Breaking News That Will Change Someone’s Life + Elder Vs. Millennial + Mailbag: Giving Someone a Second Chance After Standing You Up?
itunes:title: (Thurs Early) Amy Has Breaking News That Will Change Someone’s Life + Elder Vs. Millennial + Mailbag: Giving Someone a Second Chance After Standing You Up?
description:
Amy reveals some breaking news that came via email that will change a member of the show's life. Eddie and Morgan face off in the battle of generations, Elder vs. Millennial with a new fun element. In the mailbag, a listener wants to know if he should give someone a second chance after she stood him up on a date. She claims she fell asleep and missed the date. Can he give her a second chance?

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
